headline: BD Board Declares Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of BD (Becton, Dickinson and Company) (NYSE: BDX), a leading global medical technology company, today announced it has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.04 per common share, payable on June 30, 2025 to holders of record on June 9, 2025. The indicated annual dividend rate is $4.16 per share.

headline: Best Dividend Aristocrats For May 2025
summary: Dividend Aristocrats lag behind the S&P 500 in April, but 25 are undervalued with 10% returns potential. Click to read about promising Aristocrats.
